bioAsHtml: Alex is a polyglot, technology enthusiast and works as Big Data Architect at Vente-Exclusive.com. He has an R&D past at Alcatel-Lucent and Progress Software. He's part of the Devoxx steering so he will be running around with a Blue sweater.

acceptedTalks.title: Devoxx Registration: Creating our own Android Printer Driver
Migrating Devoxx Registration to Docker and Kubernetes
Second generation "workflow managers" for big data
